object.name: sow_analysis
object.property: <model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:indexer="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/indexer" xmlns:lingua="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/lingua" xmlns:users="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/users" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="section_number" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <required>False</required> <title>Breakdown Number</title> </field> <field name="bodytext" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description> </description> <required>False</required> <title>Full Scope Section Text</title> <validate_invariants>False</validate_invariants> </field> <field name="assigned_to" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description> .</description> <required>False</required> <title>Responsibility</title> <vocabulary>plone.app.vocabularies.Users</vocabulary> </field> <fieldset name="date" label="Dates" description="Due Dates"> <field name="initial_due_date" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description>Initial estimate of the due date.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Initial Due Date</title> </field> <field name="revised_due_date" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description>If the initial due date has been changed.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Revised Due Date</title> </field> </fieldset> <fieldset name="notes" label="Notes" description=" "> <field name="notes" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description>Add any notes regarding this Scope Item</description> <required>False</required> <title> " </title> </field> </fieldset> <fieldset name="actions_items" label="Actions Items" description="These are the action items generated from the analysis of this Statement of Work."> <field name="explanation" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description>What is this for</description> <required>False</required> <title>Explanation</title> </field> </fieldset> <fieldset name="qc_requirements" label="QC Requirements" description="Is QC required for this section?"> <field name="internal_qc_required_" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <default>False</default> <description>Will the output of the action item require review by internal QC?</description> <required>False</required> <title>Internal QC Required?</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.checkbox.SingleCheckBoxFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="estimated_qc_time" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description>If QC is required, please provide estimate of how long. Contact the QC department if needed to get good estimate.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Estimated QC Time</title> <values> <element>1 hour</element> <element>3 hours</element> <element>5 hours</element> </values> </field> <field name="notes_to_qc" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description>Enter anything that might help the QC process</description> <required>False</required> <title>Notes to QC</title> </field> <field name="finishing_date_for_qc" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Finishing Date for QC</title> </field> <field name="date_wc_finished" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Date WC Finished</title> </field> <field name="date_item_finished" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Date Item Finished</title> </field> </fieldset> <fieldset name="deliverables" label="Deliverables"> <field name="responsible_parties" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Responsible Parties</title> <vocabulary>plone.app.vocabularies.Users</vocabulary> </field> <field name="quality_procedure" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Quality Procedure</title> <vocabulary>DocentIMS.ActionItems.QPVocabulary</vocabulary> </field> <field name="deliverable_text" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Deliverable Text</title> </field> </fieldset> <fieldset name="analysis_notes" label="Close out" description="Person analyzing this Scope section add any notes regarding your analysis."> <field name="is_the_analyis_complete" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <default>False</default> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Is the analyis complete</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.checkbox.SingleCheckBoxFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="analysis_notes" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Analysis Notes</title> </field> </fieldset> <fieldset name="close_out" label="Close Out" description="Actions taken to close this analysis"/> </schema> </model>
